PrimaryDisplay = require('screen').getPrimaryDisplay()
tw = getWin('toolbar')
  tw.move(PrimaryDisplay.bounds.width - 63, 25);
  tw.object.setSize(60,400)

arr = _.chain(localStorage).mapObject(d=>JSON.parse(d)) .map((d,k)=>[k,_.pluck(d,'sourceText')]).flatten().compact().uniq().value()//.length //.values().flatten().pluck('sourceText').uniq().value()//.length arr.map((d,k)=>`

---${k}------------------------------------------

\n 
${_.escape(d)}
`).join('\n')

${van_dump(txt0)}

${van_dump(Object.keys(cw))}
df`; getWin(just.name).execute('setContent(`'+txt+'`)') wwidth = 250 getWin(just.name).object.setPosition(screen.width-wwidth, 0) getWin(just.name).object.setSize(wwidth, screen.height) //JSON.parse(localStorage.Knows)[14].sourceText Matrix.getDb().getAllData() 1 tableify = require('tableify'); data = Matrix.getDb().getAllData() tableify(data)
